summary: The Eliminating Looting of Our Nation by Mitigating Unethical State Kleptocracy Act of 2025 (ELON MUSK Act) prohibits special government employees from holding or benefiting from contracts or agreements with the Federal Government. It mandates the termination of existing contracts held by such employees upon the Act's enactment. The bill defines "special Government employee" based on Title 18, Section 202 of the United States Code.
